name: Bacon Mollete with Black Beans, Eggs and Salsa Fresca
author: Farmland
summary: Mexican bolillo rolls are filled with a zesty black bean spread, fried eggs and bacon, salsa fresca, and crumbled cheese for a hearty lunch or dinner.
ingredients: 2  Mexican bolillo rolls or baguettes, sliced in half horizontally
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
½  jalapeno pepper, seeds removed, diced
directions: Black Bean Spread: Heat vegetable oil in medium saute pan over medium heat
Saute until softened, and then add garlic
Add black beans, cumin and lime juice, and stir to combine
Cook until beans are warmed through
Transfer to blender and blend until smooth, adding chicken stock to achieve spreadable consistency
Salsa Fresca: In mixing bowl, combine all ingredients but seasonings, and then season with salt and pepper
To Serve: Toast bread lightly in oven or toaster
Top bottom half with Black Bean Spread followed by bacon
Garnish with Salsa Fresca, cheese and more cilantro
Place other half of bread on top
